text.name: Vinaya-Piṭaka 1, Māhavagga
text.description: Based on the edition by Hermann Oldenberg, London: Pali Text Society 1879, Reprinted 1929, 1964, 1997.

text.name: Vinaya-Piṭaka 2, Cullavagga
text.description: Based on the edition by Hermann Oldenberg, London: Pali Text Society 1880, Reprinted 1930, 1964, 1977, 1995.

text.name: Vinaya-Piṭaka 3, Suttavibhaṅga 1
text.description: Based on the edition by Hermann Oldenberg: The Vinaya Piṭakam, Vol. III: The Suttavibhaṅga, First Part (Pārājika, Saṃghādisesa, Aniyata, Nissaggiya), London: Pali Text Society 1881, Reprinted 1964, 1984, 1993.

text.name: Vinaya-Piṭaka 4, Suttavibhaṅga 2
text.description: Based on the edition by Hermann Oldenberg: The Vinaya Piṭakam, Vol. IV: The Suttavibhaṅga, Second Part (End of the Mahāvibhaṅga; Bhikkhunīvibhaṅga), London: Pali Text Society 1882, Reprinted 1964, 1984, 1993.

text.name: Vinaya-Piṭaka 5, Parivāra
text.description: Based on the edition by Hermann Oldenberg: The Vinaya Piṭakam, Vol. V: The Parivāra, London: Pali Text Society 1883, Reprinted 1964, 1982.

text.name: Dīgha-Nikāya 1, Suttantas 1-13
text.description: Vol. I: Sīlakkhandavagga, Suttantas 1-13. Based on the edition by T.W. Rhys Davids and J.E. Carpenter, London: Pali Text Society 1890.

text.name: Dīgha-Nikāya 2, Suttantas 14-23
text.description: Vol. II: Mahāvagga, Suttantas 14-23. Based on the edition by T.W. Rhys Davids and J.E. Carpenter, London: Pali Text Society 1903.

text.name: Dīgha-Nikāya 3, Suttantas 24-34
text.description: Vol. III: Pātikavagga, Suttantas 24-34. Based on the edition by T.W. Rhys Davids and J.E. Carpenter, London: Pali Text Society 1911.

text.name: Majjhima-Nikāya 1, Suttantas 1-76
text.description: Based on Vol. I, ed. by V. Trenckner, London: Pali Text Society 1888, Reprinted 1948, 1964, 1979

text.name: Majjhima-Nikāya 2, Suttantas 77-106
text.description: Based on Vol. II, ed. by Robert Chalmers, London: Pali Text Society 1896, Reprinted 1951, 1960, 1977

text.name: Majjhima-Nikāya 3, Suttantas 107-152
text.description: Based on Vol. III, ed. by R. Chalmers, London: Pali Text Society 1899, Reprinted 1951, 1977

text.name: Saṃyutta-Nikāya 1, Sagātha-Vagga
text.description: Part I: Sagatha-Vagga. Based on the edition by L. Feer, London: Pali Text Society 1884.

text.name: Saṃyutta-Nikāya 2, Nidāna-Vagga
text.description: Part II: Nidana-Vagga. Based on the edition by L. Feer, London: Pali Text Society 1888.

text.name: Saṃyutta-Nikāya 3, Khanda-Vagga
text.description: Part III: Khanda-Vagga. Based on the edition by L. Feer, London: Pali Text Society 1890.

text.name: Saṃyutta-Nikāya 4, Saḷāyatana-Vagga
text.description: Part IV: Salayatana-Vagga. Based on the edition by L. Feer, London: Pali Text Society 1894.

text.name: Saṃyutta-Nikāya 5, Mahā-Vagga
text.description: Part V: Maha-Vagga. Based on the edition by L. Feer, London: Pali Text Society 1898.

text.name: Aṅguttara-Nikāya 1, Eka-Duka-Tikanipāta
text.description: Part I: Ekanipata, Dukanipata, Tikanipata. Based on the edition by R. Morris, London: Pali Text Society 1885, second edition, revised by A.K. Warder, 1961.

text.name: Aṅguttara-Nikāya 2, Catukkanipata
text.description: Part II: Catukkanipata. Based on the edition by R. Morris, London: Pali Text Society 1888, Reprinted 1976.

text.name: Aṅguttara-Nikāya 3, Pancaka-Chakkanipāta
text.description: Part III: Pancakanipata, Chakkanipata. Based on the edition by E. Hardy, London: Pali Text Society 1897, Reprinted 1976.

text.name: Aṅguttara-Nikāya 4, Sattaka-Atthaka-Navakanipāta
text.description: Part IV: Sattakanipata, Atthakanipata, Navakanipata. Based on the edition by E. Hardy, London: Pali Text Society 1899, Reprinted 1958.

text.name: Aṅguttara-Nikāya 5, Dasaka-Ekadasakanipāta
text.description: Part V: Dasakanipata, Ekadasakanipata. Based on the edition by E. Hardy, London: Pali Text Society 1900, Reprinted 1958.

text.name: Khuddakapāṭha
text.description: Based on the edition Helmer Smith from a collation by Mabel Hunt, London: Pali Text Society 1915, Reprinted 1959, 1978

text.name: Dhammapada
text.description: Based on the edition by O.v. Hinüber and K.R. Norman, London: Pali Text Society 1995.

text.name: Udāna
text.description: Based on the edition by Paul Steinthal, London: Pali Text Society 1885, Reprinted 1948, 1982.

text.name: Itivuttaka
text.description: Based on the edition by Ernst Windisch, London: Pali Text Society 1889, Reprinted 1948, 1975.

text.name: Suttanipāta
text.description: Based on the edition by Dines Andersen and Helmer Smith: Sutta-Nipāta, London: Pali Text Society 1913, Reprinted 1948, 1965, 1984.

text.name: Vimānavatthu
text.description: Based on the edition by N.A. Jayawickrama: Vimānavatthu and Petavatthu, London: Pali Text Society 1977.

text.name: Petavatthu
text.description: Based on the edition by N.A. Jayawickrama: Vimānavatthu and Petavatthu, London: Pali Text Society 1977.

text.name: Theragāthā
text.description: Based on the edition by Hermann Oldenberg: The Thera- and Therī-Gāthā (Stanzas Ascribed to Elders of the Buddhist Order of Recluses), ed. by H. Oldenberg and R. Pischel, London: Pali Text Society 1883. Second edition with appendices by K.R. Norman and L. Alsdorf, 1966, pp. 1-115.

text.name: Therīgāthā
text.description: Based on the edition by Richard Pischel: The Thera- and Therī-Gāthā (Stanzas Ascribed to Elders of the Buddhist Order of Recluses), ed. by H. Oldenberg and R. Pischel, London: Pali Text Society 1883. Second edition with appendices by K.R. Norman and L. Alsdorf, 1966, pp. 123-250.

text.name: Apadāna
text.description: Based on the edition by Mary E. Lilley: The Apadāna of the Khuddaka Nikāya, Parts I and II, London: The Pali Text Society 1925/1927.

text.name: Buddhavaṃsa
text.description: Based on the new edition by N.A. Jayawickrama: Buddhavaṃsa and Cariyāpiṭaka, London: Pali Text Society 1974.

text.name: Cariyāpiṭaka
text.description: Based on the new edition by N.A. Jayawickrama: Buddhavaṃsa and Cariyāpiṭaka, London: Pali Text Society 1974.

text.name: Jātaka 1, Ekanipāta
text.description: Based on the edition by V. Fausböll: The Jātaka together with its commentary, being tales of the anterior births of Gotama Buddha. For the first time edited in the original Pāli, Vol. I, London: Pali Text Society 1877, Reprinted 1962.

text.name: Jātaka 2, Duka-Tikanipāta
text.description: Based on the edition by V. Fausböll: The Jātaka together with its commentary, being tales of the anterior births of Gotama Buddha. For the first time edited in the original Pāli, Vol. II, London: Pali Text Society 1879, Reprinted 1963.

text.name: Jātaka 3, Nipatas IV-IX
text.description: Based on the edition by V. Fausböll: The Jātaka together with its commentary, being tales of the anterior births of Gotama Buddha. For the first time edited in the original Pāli, Vol. III, London: Pali Text Society 1883, Reprinted 1963.

text.name: Jātaka 4, Nipatas X-XV
text.description: Based on the edition by V. Fausböll: The Jātaka together with its commentary, being tales of the anterior births of Gotama Buddha. For the first time edited in the original Pāli, Vol. IV, London: Pali Text Society 1887, Reprinted 1963.

text.name: Jātaka 5, Nipatas XVI-XXI
text.description: Based on the edition by V. Fausböll: The Jātaka together with its commentary, being tales of the anterior births of Gotama Buddha. For the first time edited in the original Pāli, Vol. V, London: Pali Text Society 1891, Reprinted 1963.

text.name: Jātaka 6, XXII Mahānipāta
text.description: Based on the edition by V. Fausböll: The Jātaka together with its commentary, being tales of the anterior births of Gotama Buddha. For the first time edited in the original Pāli, Vol. VI, London: Pali Text Society 1896, Reprinted 1964.

text.name: Niddesa 1, Mahāniddesa
text.description: Based on the edition by L. de la Vallée Poussin and E.J. Thomas: Mahāniddesa, Parts I and II, London: Pali Text Society 1916/1917, Combined reprint 1978.

text.name: Niddesa 2, Cullaniddesa
text.description: Based on the edition by Wilhelm Stede: Cullaniddesa, Oxford: Pali Text Society 1918, Reprinted 1988.

text.name: Paṭisambhidāmagga 1
text.description: Based on the edition by Arnold C. Taylor: The Paṭisambhidāmagga, Vol. I, London: Pali Text Society 1905, Reprinted 1979.

text.name: Paṭisambhidāmagga 2
text.description: Based on the edition by Arnold C. Taylor: The Paṭisambhidāmagga, Vol. II, London: Pali Text Society 1907, Reprinted 1979.

text.name: Dhammasaṅgaṇī
text.description: Based on the edition by Edward Müller, London: Pali Text Society 1885, Reprinted 1978.

text.name: Vibhaṅga
text.description: Based on the edition by C.A.F. Rhys Davids: The Vibhaṅga: Being the Second Book of the Abhidhamma Piṭaka, London: Pali Text Society 1904, Reprinted 1978.

text.name: Dhātukathā
text.description: Based on the edition by Edmund Rowland Gooneratne: The Dhātu-Kathā Pakaraṇa and its commentary, London: Pali Text Society 1892, Reprinted, with corrections 1963, 1987.

text.name: Puggalapaññatti
text.description: Based on the edition Richard Morris, London: Pali Text Society 1883, Reprinted 1972.

text.name: Kathāvatthu
text.description: Based on the edition by Arnold C. Taylor: Kathāvatthu, Vols. I, II, London: Pali Text Society 1894, Reprinted 1897, 1979.

text.name: Yamaka 1
text.description: Based on the edition Rhys Davids, London: Pali Text Society 1911, Reprinted 1987.

text.name: Yamaka 2
text.description: Based on the edition Rhys Davids, London: Pali Text Society 1913, Reprinted 1987.

text.name: Tikapaṭṭhāna 1
text.description: Based on the edition Rhys Davids, London: Pali Text Society 1921, Reprinted 1988.

text.name: Tikapaṭṭhāna 2
text.description: Based on the edition Rhys Davids, London: Pali Text Society 1922, Reprinted 1988.

text.name: Tikapaṭṭhāna 3
text.description: Based on the edition Rhys Davids, London: Pali Text Society 1923, Reprinted 1988.

text.name: Dukapaṭṭhāna
text.description: Based on the edition Rhys Davids, London: Pali Text Society 1906, Reprinted 1988.

text.name: Milindapañho
text.description: Based on the edition by V. Trenckner: The Milindapañho: Being Dialogues between King Milinda and the Buddhist Sage Nāgasena, London: Pali Text Society 1890, Reprinted 1928, 1962, 1986.

text.name: Visuddhimagga
text.description: Based on the edition by C.A.F. Rhys Davids, 2 Vols., London: Pali Text Society 1920-1921.

text.name: Samantapāsādikā 1
text.description: Buddhaghosa's Commentary on the Vinaya Piṭaka, Vol. I: Nidāna; Bhikkhuvibhaṅga: Pārājika 1. Based on the edition J. Takakusu and Makoto Nagai, assisted by Kogen Mizuno, London: Pali Text Society 1924, Reprinted 1975.

text.name: Samantapāsādikā 2
text.description: Buddhaghosa's Commentary on the Vinaya Piṭaka, Vol. II: Bhikkhuvibhaṅga: Pārājika 2-4. Based on the edition J. Takakusu and Makoto Nagai, assisted by Kogen Mizuno, London: Pali Text Society 1924, Reprinted 1975.

text.name: Samantapāsādikā 3
text.description: Buddhaghosa's Commentary on the Vinaya Piṭaka, Vol. III: Bhikkhuvibhaṅga: Saṅghādisesa, Aniyata, Nissaggiya-Pācittiya. Based on the edition J. Takakusu and Makoto Nagai, assisted by Kogen Mizuno, London: Pali Text Society 1930, Reprinted 1968.

text.name: Samantapāsādikā 4
text.description: Buddhaghosa's Commentary on the Vinaya Piṭaka, Vol. IV: Bhikkhuvibhaṅga: Pācittiya, Paṭidesanīya, Sekhiya, Adhikaraṇasamatha; Bhikkunīvibhaṅga. Based on the edition J. Takakusu and Makoto Nagai, assisted by Kogen Mizuno, London: Pali Text Society 1934, Reprinted 1967.

text.name: Samantapāsādikā 5
text.description: Buddhaghosa's Commentary on the Vinaya Piṭaka, Vol. V: Mahāvagga. Based on the edition J. Takakusu and Makoto Nagai, assisted by Kogen Mizuno, London: Pali Text Society 1938, Reprinted 1966.

text.name: Samantapāsādikā 6
text.description: Buddhaghosa's Commentary on the Vinaya Piṭaka, Vol. VI: Cullavagga. Based on the edition J. Takakusu and Makoto Nagai, London: Pali Text Society 1947, Reprinted 1982.

text.name: Samantapāsādikā 7
text.description: Buddhaghosa's Commentary on the Vinaya Piṭaka, Vol. VII: Parivāra. Based on the edition J. Takakusu and Makoto Nagai, assisted by Kogen Mizuno, London: Pali Text Society 1947, Reprinted 1981.
